name: Null point generators
content:
Null Point Generators have a smaller capacity but an increased recharged rate compared with most other variants. Shield manufacturers achieved this by replacing the relatively large capacitor arrays with a more compact variant, which allows for a larger overall number of capacitors to fit within the same physical space. However, having such a large number of capacitors all drawing current from the ship's power supply presents a considerably high energy cost as a drawback to the shield's rapid recharge rate. 

Note that installing multiple shield modules on a single ship has diminishing returns.
